posts.post_content:
vg/x - x

10,000. range

scammers need not bother.......

Good luck!  Maybe the best looking card I have ever seen (and will likely NEVER own!)

I do have his N28 which I adore - but the Goodwin card is just tiny little baseball art!

If you do land one, please post a photo - would live to see it.

Jeff

as are all the N162 champions. Kelly would finish my set - one of my few goals before passing :-)

STILL LOOKING :eek:
Well Henry, looks like were in the same position and have the same bucket list item...  I should have picked it up years ago, just got lazy.

an SGC 30 that I sold for around 2000.00 a few of years ago. I listed it a couple of times for around 2500.00 or best offer without a sale. Apparently demand increased immediately after I sold it :-) In any event the registration really bothered me and all the baseball players and stars in my better set were vg/x and clean with good eye appeal. It's now my only set - the other went to REA - eventually I'll get a Kelly in my very reasonable range......

Never makes me feel better that others are in the same boat - Fred I hope you manage to get yours as well.
won't unlock an example. People must have too much money :-)
Perhaps not the ideal example due to a stamp on the back but Hertiage just listed one that looks nice otherwise.
Going to be one pricey “2”, the Kelly in Heritage.
